entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.DefaultMetricsFactoryTests.MeterDisposeTest` timing out in CI #105189
  • `JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering` failing in CI #105187
  • `JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral` failing in CI with "Assert failure: `arrayBaseRef->GetArrayElementType() == ELEMENT_TYPE_OBJECT`" #105186
  • GZipStream decompression bug #105183
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.WriteTests failed with "System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity." #105177
  • linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable failing to build with "Unable to find toolchain executable. Name: 'ar', Prefix: 'llvm-'" #105176
  • Investigate if RSA issue can happen with ECDSA/ECDH on OpenSSL < 3.0 #105175
    9.0.0
  • Consider forcing default provider for Verify and Encrypt #105174
    Future
  • Remove EC_KEY code from S.S.Cryptography.Native #105173
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: CollectionsMarshall.AsMemory(List<T>? list) #105179
    Future
  • Starting a .NET process with CreateProcessW using lpApplicationName ends up in messed up commandline args #105085
  • Add ability to output a shim .exe + .dll for an application (for WinRT activation) #103451
    Future
  • nativeaot\\SmokeTests\\Reflection\\Reflection\\Reflection.cmd fails with Access Violation #105136
  • Add common ancestor for ICollection<T> and IReadOnlyCollection<T> #105180
  • OpenSSL provider support #89167
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose JsonPropertyInfo.MemberName #105155
  • [API Proposal]: ruby #105172
  • [Perf] Windows/x64 Regressions in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Perf_FloatingPointTensorPrimitives<Double> #102514
    9.0.0
  • Implement DebugSettings.LayoutCycleTracingLevel #105100
  • SIGSEGV in Finalizer thread calling SafeX509Handle.ReleaseHandle #101804
  • [NativeAOT] Intermittent crash accessing thread statics on Windows Arm64 #104500
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Call gtFoldExpr in morph for tier0 #105190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Have lowering set up IR for post-indexed addressing and make strength reduced IV updates amenable to post-indexed addressing #105185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add an emitter peephole for for post-indexed addressing #105181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix typo `AgressiveInlining` -> `AggressiveInlining` #105184
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Dedup methods in `GregorianCalendarHelper` #105188
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix clang19 build #105141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions #105143
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Switch `StaysWithinManagedObject` to peel offsets from VNs #105169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Introducing Environment.CpuUsage #105152
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2499066 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete dead code related to intercept stubs #105127
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unused members on runtime Thread #105158
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Draft] JIT: Testing field-wise analysis #105162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix method numbering in Memory-model.md example code #105168
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Calculate version range in init-compiler.sh script #105129
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add a thread pool config var on Windows for choosing the number of IOCPs #105145
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Disable verify_committed_bytes for segments #105102
    area-GC-coreclr
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Move GetMethodTable to JIT #105098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Emit More EventSource Data For Metrics Measurements #104993
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Fixed for assertion failure due to not checking if we are processing Ephemeral Samples in calculate_new_heap_count #105164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison to non-default constants #52629
    Backlog
  • Nonsense identifier expected error depending on how you edit unrelated code #74456
  • An easier way to execute 'Wrap every parameter -> Indent all parameters' #59927
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #56916
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware #56915
  • Need custom configurations and New Default implementations for Identity Endpoints #56914
  • Cannot navigate to Nested Razor Component #56913
  • Blazor JS to .Net Streaming. IJSStreamReference using same stream reference. #56912
  • Enum as API method's parameter ignoring naming policy when binding #56907
  • Please provide a way to disable the DeveloperExceptionPage during development. #56906

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56845
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, multiple_queries #56900
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #56910
  • An unhandled exception of type 'System.ArgumentException' occurred in Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.dll: 'The path must be absolute.' #56883
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56902
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc #56870
  • OpenAPI schema transformers not working correctly for types #56899
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Move guardian suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #56911
    area-infrastructure
  • Update gRPC, Protobuf package versions #56909
    area-grpc
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • mark verified files as lf and utf8 #56643
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 9.0-preview7
  • Reset OpenApiSchemaTransformerContext before each invocation #56905
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #56766
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Back Button Minimizes App When BlazorWebView Inside RefreshView #23740
  • [Windows, .NET 9.0 Preview 6, SkiaSharp 3.0-preview4.1] SKGLView crashes the app when .NET MAUI App is built in the unpackaged mode #23737
  • My Splash screen is not working in ios after upgrade to net8.0 #23736
  • Grid with auto width columns overflows its container #23735
  • Scrollviews inside Grids come up faulty in screenshots #23733
  • Android Tabbar, clicking 4th tab opens the 5th tab #23732

Closed

  • CollectionView DisconnectHandler SelectionMode=Multiple Windows exception #23649
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial Commit #23738

Merged

  • Use UIView.Window instead of the global window #23693
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView DisconnectHandler SelectionMode Crash #23726
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview

Updated

  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • Obsolete compatibility layout #23710
    area-layout
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, area-fonts, community ✨
  • HybridWebView: Remove unneeded DefaultFile / HybridRoot handler properties #23730
    area-controls-hybridwebview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server: Rewrite query to support aggregate functions over aggregates/subqueries #34256
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cosmos: Validate our current container mapping strategy #34005
  • Query: Throw better exception when aggregate operation hits client eval #15937
  • Aggregate of count on a nested table (one to many relationship) throws an exception #34020
  • GroupBy() isn't working as expected unless I first load the individual items into memory #32014
  • Supporting OUTER APPLY for aggregate queries #34173
  • Sum function - cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery #20559
  • Sum followed by a group by: "Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery. " #28238
  • SQL Error: Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery. #34246
  • Expose indices, constraints names on model snapshot #34253
  • Unable to insert records into tables consisting of only a primary key #34254

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for database window functions - WIP #34258
  • Move ExecuteUpdate/ExecuteDelete to core so non-relational providers can implement #34257

Updated

  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
